TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlNotificationRequest extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示指定之命令的告知要求。

span.span: Represents a request for notification for a given command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別提供低階存取 SQL Server 2005 所公開的查詢通知服務。This class provides low-level access to the query notification services exposed by SQL Server 2005. 對於大部分應用程式類別提供更簡單的方式來使用查詢通知。For most applications the class provides a simpler way of using query notifications. 不過，如果您需要精密控制透過時通知，或是您需要自訂的通知，一部分傳回的訊息資料類別是要使用。However, if you need fine control over when notifications occur, or you need to customize the message data returned as part of a notification, the class is the one to use.

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用預設值，建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果預設建構函式用來建立物件，該執行個體必須具有其和屬性指派的物件之前初始化物件的屬性。If the default constructor is used to create a object, that instance must have its and properties initialized before assigning the object to a object's property. 使用建構函式的預設值是 NULL (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 的，為空字串。 ，零的。The default values used by the constructor are NULL (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for the , an empty string for the , and zero for the .

MemberSignature.Value: public SqlNotificationRequest (string userData, string options, int timeout);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string userData, string options, int32 timeout) cil managed
Public Sub New (userData As String, options As String, timeout As Integer)
public: SqlNotificationRequest(System::String ^ userData, System::String ^ options, int timeout);

param.name: userData
param.span: 包含這個告知之特定應用程式識別項的字串，

span.span: A string that contains an application-specific identifier for this notification.

param.span: 這個字串不是由告知基礎結構所使用，不過可讓您用來使告知與應用程式狀態產生關聯。

span.span: It is not used by the notifications infrastructure, but it allows you to associate notifications with the application state.

param.span: 這個參數中所指示的值會包含在 Service Broker 佇列訊息中。

span.span: The value indicated in this parameter is included in the Service Broker queue message.

param.name: options
param.span: 包含公佈告知訊息之 Service Broker 服務名稱的字串，且該字串必須包含資料庫名稱或 Service Broker 執行個體 GUID，以便將服務名稱查閱範圍限制在特定的資料庫。

span.span: A string that contains the Service Broker service name where notification messages are posted, and it must include a database name or a Service Broker instance GUID that restricts the scope of the service name lookup to a particular database.

param.span: 如需 options 參數格式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。

span.span: For more information about the format of the options parameter, see .

param.name: timeout
param.span: 等待告知訊息的時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The time, in seconds, to wait for a notification message.

summary.span: 採用使用者定義的字串來建立 類別的新執行個體，該字串會指定特定告知要求、預先定義之 SQL Server 2005 Service Broker 服務名稱，以及以秒計算的逾時期限。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with a user-defined string that identifies a particular notification request, the name of a predefined SQL Server 2005 Service Broker service name, and the time-out period, measured in seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可讓您在初始化新執行個體，以提供您自己的識別項、 SQL Server 2005 Service Broker 服務名稱和逾時值。This constructor allows you to initialize a new instance, providing your own identifier, the SQL Server 2005 Service Broker service name, and a time-out value.

span.span: The value of the parameter is NULL.

exception.span: 或 參數比 長，或者 參數中的值小於零。

span.span: The or parameter is longer than or the value in the parameter is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Options { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定公佈告知訊息的 SQL Server Service Broker 服務名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL Server Service Broker service name where notification messages are posted.

value.span: ，包含公佈告知訊息的 SQL Server 2005 Service Broker 服務名稱，以及限制伺服器名稱查閱範圍的資料庫或 Service Broker 執行個體 GUID。

span.span: that contains the SQL Server 2005 Service Broker service name where notification messages are posted and the database or service broker instance GUID to scope the server name lookup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性具有下列格式：The value of the property has the following format: `service={;(local database=|broker instance=)}` 例如，如果您使用 「 AdventureWorks 」 資料庫中的服務"myservice"的格式如下：For example, if you use the service "myservice" in the database "AdventureWorks" the format is: `service=myservice;local database=AdventureWorks` 在伺服器上都必須設定先前的 SQL Server Service Broker 服務。The SQL Server Service Broker service must be previously configured on the server. 此外，Service Broker 服務和佇列必須定義，而且需要身為授與的安全性存取。In addition, a Service Broker service and queue must be defined and security access granted as needed. 請參閱 SQL Server 2005 文件如需詳細資訊。See the SQL Server 2005 documentation for more information.

span.span: The value is NULL.
The value is longer than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Timeout { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定在作業逾時前 SQL Server 等候變更發生的時間。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how long SQL Server waits for a change to occur before the operation times out.

value.span: 帶正負號的整數 (Signed Integer) 值，指定在作業逾時前 SQL Server 等候變更發生的時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: A signed integer value that specifies, in seconds, how long SQL Server waits for a change to occur before the operation times out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 逾時期限到期後，即使沒有變更發生傳送通知。After the time-out period expires, the notification is sent even if no change takes place. 屬性預設為伺服器上設定的值。The property defaults to the value set on the server.

span.span: The value is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ UserData { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個告知的特定應用程式識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets an application-specific identifier for this notification.

value.span: 這個告知之特定應用程式識別項的 值。

span.span: A value of the application-specific identifier for this notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值不是由通知基礎結構。This value is not used by the notifications infrastructure. 相反地，它是一套機制，可讓應用程式與應用程式狀態的通知。Instead, it is a mechanism that allows an application to associate notifications with application state. 中指定的值屬性包含在 SQL Server 2005 佇列訊息。The value specified in the property is included in the SQL Server 2005 queue message.

span.span: The value is longer than .
